price: Jika kamu memperoleh kebaikan, niscaya mereka bersedih hati, tetapi Jika kamu mendapat bencana, mereka bergembira karenanya. Jika kamu bersabar dan bertakwa, niscaya tipu daya mereka sedikit pun tidak mendatangkan kemudaratan kepadamu.  Sesungguhnya Allah mengetahui segala apa yang mereka kerjakan.
arabic: إِن تَمۡسَسۡكُمۡ حَسَنَةٞ تَسُؤۡهُمۡ وَإِن تُصِبۡكُمۡ سَيِّئَةٞ يَفۡرَحُواْ بِهَاۖ وَإِن تَصۡبِرُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ لَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in tamsaskum ḥasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tuṣib'kum sayyi-atun yafraḥū bihā wa-in taṣbirū watattaqū lā yaḍurrukum kayduhum shayan inna al-laha bimā yaʿmalūna muḥīṭun
